channel.title: Blog on Education Funding UK
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Education Funding UK

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Hello, this is a quick post to say hello! After working in the field of education funding for several years, I have amassed a prodigious list of bookmarks - and every year the list grows as more resources are published, new organisations emerge, and new web services are developed. It was becoming tricky to keep track of all these links, and trickier still to make them available to colleagues in a simple and straightforward way.
